channel.title: Internet disconnecting
channel.description:
So i got this source and client >>>>>>>> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,514319.500.html
I got it to work and when i log in and i click on "click here to play" it starts to load and gets stuck on 100% and then freezes there and then disconnects my internet. Can anybody tell me how to fix it or how to prevent this from happening?

item.title: Internet disconnecting
